attributes.additional_details: We are a group of students from Highcliffe school in Dorset. We are in year 8 and we are trying to raise awarness of the arms trade treaty. We would really like the treaty for the arms trade to come into action and for the unnecessary suffering in other countries (as a result of Arms trade) to stop. The governments meetings say they are for the arms trade treaty but we think it actually time to make a difference
